channel.title: Flask on Tobias Larysch: Personal Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Flask on Tobias Larysch: Personal Portfolio

item.title: Deploying ML Models using Flask and Heroku
item.description: After building and training a ML model, the next step to actually generate business value is to deploy the model so that it can be used in production. In this blog I build a small App and deploy the genre classification model built in the last blogpost on Heroku.
